name: Naughty Bear Double Trouble
summary:
Double Trouble is two games in one and double the amount of Naughtiness with our favorite Naughty Bear. 
Gold Edition - The bears had a party and Naughty Bear wasn't invited. Now they will pay... with their lives. All the fun of the original but with 3 new episodes, 3 new weapons and kills and 12 new costumes. Naughty Bear Gold also contains 4 new Multiplayer Modes. 
Panic in Paradise - When bears went on holiday to Paradise Island, Naughty Bear wasn't going to let them get away with that! With 11 new environments, an insane amount of costumes, weapons, upgrades and ultra kills, this is one holiday Naughty Bear won't forget in a hurry!
